attributes.action: Please stop the distribution of the Yellow Pages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is a great waste of both paper and man power to print this directory when you can find all of the information on the internet, what about sending a brief letter requesting who would like a copy.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact Yellow Pages directly with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
